attributes.description:
FUEL SAVER 7 SEATER

2016 Chevrolet Captiva 2.4 LT (123KW)

* 7 Seater
* Keyless entry
* Park distance control
* Cruise control
* Electric windows
* Side steps
* 18" Alloy mags
* Phone projection 7" Car screen
* Hill start assist
* Hill descent assist
* Leather steering wheel

R219900 or installment from R3990 p/m with no deposit. No drivers license required. Trade inns welcome

#ESTABLISHED 93 YEARS #TRUSTED DEALERSHIP #BROKENSHAS

This vehicle is AVAILABLE FOR FINANCE.
Give us a call today to apply. 
Finance price is R10 000 more due to terms & conditions on a finance deal. 
The vehicle goes in for AA Dekra test, if any faults are found on the vehicle it shall be attended to at the cost of the dealership. 
If the vehicle is due for a service it’s carried out at the cost of the dealership. ETC....

attributes.description: All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXSTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. attributes.description: Excellent Condition, Mags, Economical Low KM with a Full Service History! BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of the vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager – Linden Jacobs As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully-fledged automotive dealer group offers New Cars, Used Cars, Parts, and services to all existing and potential customers. With us, you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.
